item.title: HÃ¤hnchen mit Reis, indisch
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Dieses Gericht hat mir beigebracht was scharfes Essen ist. Chilli-Pulver vorsichtig dosieren!

item.title: Procmail learns html
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Recently I wrote a procmail filter which filters mail for a ticketing system (request-tracker). It filters mails which addresses the ticketing system in Cc as well as mails with attachments bigger than 10 MB. I went through quite a learning curve while writing this filter so I’d like to share it here.

item.title: About me
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: I like IT among many other things, I like free software. I find great joy in designing and creating systems that work well. Doing so gets me in the zone, which can feel like pure extasy. My life is designed to be there often, while I recognize there are other joys. I share some of the systems I developed here, to find even more joy and to contribute. I fell in and out of love with philosophy and a certain type of spirituality.
